      • calcNextEdge

        public ImagePoint calcNextEdge()
        Calculate the next Edge from the current pixel. Starts from RIGHT --> BOTTOM --> LEFT --> TOP Neighbour Pixel returns NULL if all edges where explored-
        Returns:
        an ImagePoint object or null if there is no edge left

      • getNextBoundary

        public BoundaryPixel getNextBoundary()
        Explore the next Edge of the Pixel. Returns null if all edges have been explored for this pixel
        Returns:
        the BoundaryPixel of the next Neighbour
